<title level="1" right="Rules">[War Encounter Structure](/Rules.aspx?ID=1869)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 578</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A war encounter takes place over the course of several rounds, with each round representing an hour of battle. The battle continues until all armies on one side are [defeated](/Conditions.aspx?ID=45) (reduced to 0 HP) or [routed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=55).
</column>
